nodes.text: The Curich-class shuttle was an Imperial shuttle design.
The Curich-class was designed to carry light cargo or passengers for quick, short duration trips, such as across well-known hyperspace routes.

Shortly after the destruction of the first Death Star, Governor General Lord Dixton employed a Curich-class shuttle fitted to serve his needs to transport himself and his entourage to Vakkar, the capital of the Fakir sector. However, during transit, his transport was attacked by Rebel forces.
